mapper.sql: id, shop_name, shop_addr, link_man, link_tel, link_email, link_qq, sub_time
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'false' as QUERYID,
,
from t_join_information
order by ${orderByClause}
limit ${startIndex},${pageSize}
mapper.insert:
insert into t_join_information
id,
shop_name,
shop_addr,
link_man,
link_tel,
link_email,
link_qq,
sub_time,
send_place,

mapper.update:
update t_join_information
shop_name = #{shopName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
shop_addr = #{shopAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
link_man = #{linkMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
link_tel = #{linkTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
link_email = #{linkEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
link_qq = #{linkQq,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sub_time = #{subTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
send_place = #{sendPlace,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update t_join_information set shop_name = #{shopName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shop_addr = #{shopAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, link_man = #{linkMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, link_tel = #{linkTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, link_email = #{linkEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, link_qq = #{linkQq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sub_time = #{subTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, send_place = #{sendPlace,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
